content: Adding to this: I guess that would imply having a canonical format for shorthand?
@Gino Canessa keeps promising this for someday. Maybe if we all chipped in for beer, it would speed it up.
We're working on it. We'll have an alpha capability to try out at the Connectathon!
Lol @David Pyke . Trying, but day job keeps getting in the way.
excuse me? you must know the old joke about american beer and making love in a canoe?!?
No, he's right. Drinking American beer leaves you motivated because you're just drinking flavoured water. Canadian beer actually has a noticeable amount of alcohol
you all must be drinking that high-volume production stuff... yuck, why would you do that when there are high quality craft breweries everywhere.. well, everywhere in Wisconsin
Yes, Wisconsin... the world renown home for quality beer. Old Milkwakee and the like
Schlitz - when you're out of Schlitz, you're out of beer!
@Chris Moesel can you add in yaml too

These days there are many American micro-brews that have a wide selection of almost any type of bear you would want. It's not just the big American beer companies anymore. --- actually, I think the biggest US beer company (Budweiser) is now owned by a European company so can you still call it ;'American beer' ;-)

https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/business/wp/2014/09/23/nations-most-iconic-beer-brands-are-being-bought-by-foreign-investors-so-what/
Back to the original topic, we are going to have a preview of GoFSH at the Connectathon (JSON -> FSH)
yes, but what brand of beer will you be serving?
